posts.title: linux
posts.text: vmware共享目录！first vmware-hgfsclient-o 显示拥有的与每个连接关联的进程 ID-n 以数字形式显示地址和端口号-a 以数字形式显示地址和端口号C:\Users\username>netstat -o -n -a | findstr :8080 TCP 0.0.0.0:3000 0.0.0.0:0 LISTENING 3116 C:\Users\username>taskkill /F /PID 3116 taskkill /F 指定强制终止进程。 为Linux每一行编号：set nu取消行号：set nonu 设置缩进:12,19s/^/ / 缩进几行就打几个空格 SSH连接另一台linuxssh msfadmin@192.168.206.130 scp远程传送本电脑上的文件到另一台电脑上scp linux新增账号adduser xiaoxiong
Hello Worldwelcome to xiong’s blog.It’s really nice to have you in my blog

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
